messages.subject: Re: Sayagaki article question
messages.msgSnippet: Ron and All, I haven t checked the detail, but it might be in this discussion.  It s a good read anyway:
messages.messageBody:
Ron and All,

I haven't checked the detail, but it might be in this discussion. It's a good read anyway:
http://www.militaria.co.za/nmb/viewtopic.php?f=15&t=7067&p=56471&hilit=tanobe#p56471

Regards,
Barry Thomas.
----- Original Message -----
From: Ron Hartmann
To: TOKEN ; nihontostudy ; nihonto@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, June 26, 2010 3:50 AM
Subject: Sayagaki article question


I seem to recall reading something not too long ago that explained several of the special notations used by Tanobe san in his sayagaki. Does anyone else recall reading this somewhere if if so, do you recall where???

Ron
STL
